alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 10 at 2:27PM MDT until April 12 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches with higher amounts for peaks. Wind gusts around 30 to 35 mph with higher gusts during frontal passage in afternoon. * WHERE...Pioneer Mountains, Baldy, Galena, Galena Summit, Sun Valley, Ketchum and Copper Basin. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to midnight MDT Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Expect near whiteout conditions with frontal passage in the afternoon. The hazardous conditions will likely impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sun Valley Region
